entry.title: https://github.com/OpenCSGs/csghub
entry.content: CSGHub is a brand-new open-source platform for managing LLMs, developed by the OpenCSG team. It offers both open-source and on-premise/SaaS solutions, with features comparable to Hugging Face. Gain full control over the lifecycle of LLMs, datasets, and agents, with Python SDK compatibility with Hugging Face. Join us! ⭐️
